steps.title: order registration guide
steps.description: to register an order, follow the steps below in order

stepOne.title: Product selection
stepOne.description: First, choose your product from the store

stepTwo.title: Order
stepTwo.description: In the next step, register your product and fill in your information in the order registration form.

stepThree.title: Contract
stepThree.description: In the third step, contact the company or wait for the call of our experts, then visit the company in person or in person to conclude a contract.

stepFour.title: Product delivery
stepFour.description: Necessary arrangements for cash or interest-free installment payments will be made with you and the product will be sent to you within a specified administrative period.

one.text: After registering your email, a link will be emailed to you, and by clicking on that link, you will be redirected to the password change page.
